Attacks.Name: Thunder Shock
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage and may Stun the target if a wild is rolled.

Attacks.Name: Volt Tackle
Attacks.Effect: Deals damage and pushes the target L if a wild is rolled.

Attacks.Name: Thunder
Attacks.Effect: Damages all characters within range 2 of the target. A wild roll applies the Shocked condition, reducing attack strength by 1.

Superpowers.Name: Lightning Rod
Superpowers.Effect: Redirects any electric-based attack targeted within range 3 to Raikou, gaining 1 power for each attack redirected.

Superpowers.Name: Storm Summoner
Superpowers.Effect: At the beginning of the turn, if outside, Raikou may change the weather to stormy, enhancing its electric attacks for that turn.

Attacks.Name: Electro Ball
Attacks.Effect: A hit applies the Paralyzed condition, preventing the target from moving next turn.

Attacks.Name: Spark
Attacks.Effect: This quick attack allows Raikou to immediately take a move action if a wild is rolled.

Attacks.Name: Wild Charge
Attacks.Effect: Deals massive damage and causes recoil damage to Raikou. Raikou takes 1 damage but gains 2 power if a wild is rolled.

Superpowers.Name: Electric Surge
Superpowers.Effect: Gives Raikou a boost, adding 2 dice to all electric attack rolls for the rest of the game. This superpower can be used only once per game.
